CustomField.description: Date of the first gift from this account. Compares First Gift Date for all related contacts and grabs the earliest. Includes hard and soft credits; excludes planned gifts. Calculated in Snowflake and pushed into Salesforce when there's a qualifying change.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The oldest received hard or soft credit ‘Close Date’ for all contacts in this account (excludes Planned Gifts)
CustomField.label: First Gift Date
